summary: The BECCS Advancement Commission Act of 2025 establishes a commission within the Department of Agriculture to improve federal policy regarding Bioenergy with Carbon Capture and Storage (BECCS). The commission will make recommendations on BECCS deployment, its impact on communities and forest health, and policies to facilitate its development. It will report to Congress within a year of its first meeting, with interim reports possible. The commission includes representatives from various federal agencies, industry, and counties receiving federal funds. It has the power to hold hearings, request information from federal agencies, and appoint personnel.
